title: Inter Medico
author: ''
date: '2022-10-25'
slug: inter_medico
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $7.1M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Inter Medico. The average
  contract duration was 0.86 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $532.8K. The longest
  contract was 5 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $12.8M.
lookup_name: 'INTER MEDICO'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '7.1M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '36'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '7'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '19%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '4173%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.57'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '14.6M'
s424_mean_duration: '0.86'
s421_mean_contract_value: '532.8K'
s425_max_duration: '5'
s422_max_contract_value: '12.8M'
---
